name: Horde Rush
description:
A horde of monsters is coming! Take down as many as you can, armed with only a sword, a bow and a shield.

Battle through zombies, skeletons, and werewolves, and gather coins and arrows.

Coins let you unlock new hero costumes, helmets, and hair.

Use the shield to protect you from monster attacks if you're overwhelmed.

As you take down monsters, your charge meter fills, and once it's filled you can use your special attack, for either the sword or the bow.

Challenge your friends and the world to the highest number of take downs, gather achievements, and share a snapshot of your final moment, across social media!

Always keep your eyes peeled.

Good luck!
